...tothe desire of some females for a “daddy;” an assertive, dominant partner, that could perhaps fill the void of an absent father figure.  This is essentially the inverse of the male desire for a “mommy gf.”  In internet memes and such, the “mommy gf” will usually be sweet, though with a dominant side.  This is a caricature of the standard mother figure, with certain attributes being more exaggerated or explicit.   We can clearly see this want for a “mommy gf” in this doujin (as well as that figure being gained, as some sort of wish fulfillment): the boy has a rude, inattentive mother who cares little for the boy.  This leads to a vacuum in the child’s development, and this child begins to pursue relations with a kind, loving, almost utopian idea of a motherly figure.  The boy literally says “I wish I had a mother like you.” It could also be seen as a clear reference to the Oedipus Complex, but it is up to interpretation.

@NoobMaster50 a man’s desire for a “big milky dom mommy gf” (as it is often called on the internet) usually stems out of a desire for a motherly or matriarchal figure.  This could be caused by an inattentive mother, with the desire for a proper figure turning into into sexual desire, or perhaps an actual desire to be with one’s actual mother.  The desire to be with your mother could be a conscious desire you are trying to fill, or it could be an that of the unconscious, perhaps relating to Sigmund Freud and his idea of the Oedipus Complex.  Though Freud’s not always correct, I find his Three Essays on the Theory of Sexuality, though it could be a little too difficult or weird for someone not used to Freud and Psychoanalysis.  The fascination with the “onee x shota” genre (though this doesn’t technically fit that, I more meant the genre of  a teenage boy being with an older or adult women) (which is primarily popular among men) also has similarities to the (1/2?)
